Description: Festival toy of wood, wire, metal, plaster and foam rubber in the form of a man playing the cymbals. The cymbals clash when the foam body is squeezed.
Curator's comments: Eth.Doc.120. Toy purchased at mulid of al-Hussein, Cairo, Nov.1990. Typical of cheap toys sold at such festivals.
Acquisition notes: Af1991,06.1 to 5 were purchased from Delia Pemberton. All the objects are recorded in the purchase book as having been purchased by the vendor in Cairo, Luxor or Abydos in November 1990. See Eth.Doc.120.
